1.0.name: wordpress/second-life-tp-widget
1.0.description: Requirements: * Adds a method of inputting your Second Life coordinates into the widget, then generates a slurl in your sidebar * Allows for the user to change the heading of the widget * Opens slurl in a new window * Hides itself if the widget is empty
